response: Welcome to our Ola Scooter module. Our revolutionary design comes in 12 stunning colors, with an extra-large boot space and iconic headlamps. The scooter is equipped with advanced technology for safety and convenience, including a side stand alert and a companion app for easy control. Enjoy features like phone-free navigation, music on the go, and an extended range of 170 kilometers on a single charge. The scooter also includes advanced regenerative braking, multiple user profiles, and a party mode for synchronized light shows. Experience superior performance with a top speed of 116 kilometers per hour and a true range of 170 kilometers. Thank you for joining us.
title: L1.1.3 Design, Technology and Performance.mp4
